title: PM thanks Emir of Qatar for humanitarian assistance for flood victims
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sept 2 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Friday thanked Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al-Thani, Emir of Qatar, for humanitarian assistance for Pakistani flood victims including a field hospital.
“Deeply indebted to my brother His Highness Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al-Thani, Emir of Qatar, for humanitarian assistance for flood victims, which includes a field hospital with 93-member staff. This hospital will be deployed in Sindh”, the Prime Minister said in a twitter post.
“We gratefully acknowledge this gesture of HH,” he added.
